vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἐμμανουήλ, ὁ (Heb. עִמָּנוּאֵל, Isa.7:14),
Immanuel: Mat.1:23 (LXX).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Isa.7.14;
son of: Joseph (G2501) and Mary (G3137);
brother of: James (G2385I), Joseph (G2500), Simon (G4613H) and Jude (G2455I)
§ Immanuel, "God with us"
Emmanuel, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 1:23*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以馬內利 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "神與人同在"
這是由童貞女所生, 彌賽亞的稱號, (太 1:23)
(參#賽 7:14), 因為耶穌既是人, 又是神, 這就顯出神住在人中間
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以马内利这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"神与人同在"
这是由童贞女所生, 弥赛亚的称号, (太1:23)
(参#赛7:14), 因为耶稣既是人, 又是神, 这就显出神住在人中间
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Em-ma-nu-ên: El nghĩa là Đức Chúa Trời, và Immnu nghĩa là với chúng ta. Emmanuel hay Immanuel nghĩa là « Đức Chúa Trời ở với chúng ta». Xem H06005
